website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy Note 5 is the most powerful phablet available on Verizon, but you'll pay a heavy price for it.

customer_reviews.title: Forces Muslim Calendar on you!
customer_reviews.text: This phone does not work. I have done all kinds of things to get it to work. I get zero "bars" with this 500+ dollar phone at my house while my husband and my mom are able to get 4+ bars on Samsung phones that cost about $120. The phone is defective. I've tried using WiFi connect, but the feature is not available on this phone either. IT'S INCOMPATIBLE WITH T-MOBILE. I'm very disappointed. Don't buy it, but if you do, make sure you return it before 30 days. The worst part is that it forces your phone to have the Muslim holidays on your calendar. You cannot delete them. Don't buy this phone. Just listen to me!!
customer_reviews.author: LLV

customer_reviews.title: Illegal Product *Do Not Purchase*
customer_reviews.text: Contacted Samsung about product sold in the US. According to them this product is not honored in there warranties and is technically illegally sold due to it not being sold within the country of official sales. Definitely learned this lesson the hard way and just want to prevent anyone else from having this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Awesome Sauce"
customer_reviews.text: This phone is so awesome. What a powerful phone, it does what it says, it's sleek and comfortable to hold in your hand, I love everything about it. I was an iPhone user before this phone, I am now an android fan for sure, and it's because of this phone. Samsung you done yourself proud.

Ive also noticed that the phone reboots on itself and crashes ocassionally like Iphones too. Pros: huge difference in the camera, camera features. I upgraded my phone from Iphone 5c into a Note 5 series. No regrets just hope this phone would last a long time like the previous notes my friend have had. I will update if something came up

(Gold) Also it came with the international charger and they shipped the travel adapter with it which was a plus. It also came with the stylus pen,headphone s, the pin to pull the Sim card out and something else that looks important. 5 stars because they did an excellent job sending and packing and its brand new.

If you are looking forward to purchasing any Galaxy Note phone this is one of the best ones out there.

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst phone ever it has been overheating
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone brand new only 3 months now. This is the worst phone ever it has been overheating, dropping calls and finally died while the battery had 86%. I took it to have it repaired and was told to go purchase any other Samsung that cost less than US$100. Those work well for a very long time. I am so disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Best all around phone
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this phone beautifully designed, it is so satisfying. The big screen just imersifies you and gives you a great experience. The new Touchwiz is also fantastic. It is fast, smooth, and essentially lag free. The 4 GB of RAM help with. This is by far the best phone I have ever owned. I previously had a Galaxy S6 Edge and I ditched it for the Note 5. Best decision of my life. I recommend this to all who love to carry a stylish phone, watch movies and play games, and get work done on their phones.

Overall the phone delivers a wonder experience. The only downside is sometimes it's a little cumbersome in the pocket because of the size.

It's also a nano Sim, so do make sure you get the right size too. Overall I adore this phone, it's everything I wanted and more. There isn't a SD slot for the phone, but come on.. It's 32Gb. Just buy a 64Gb if you need that much space.

It's worked really well, with only the occasional hiccup, and I think that's to be expected as we have yet to create The Perfect Phone. Still, this came pretty close for me, and I'm loathe to move on from it. Personally, I feel like it's a very sound purchase to make even today, with its now much lower price tag and still very reliable functionality.

customer_reviews.text: The best phone ever made. The 4g seems big but you don't really get that much play. The camera and screen is clear and crisp. Get a good case, cause this phone will break at one drop.
customer_reviews.author: Phong B. Le

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 5 N920i 32GB Gold Factory Unlocked GSM - International Version
product_meta.description: Colour Name:PLATINUM GOLDThe Samsung Galaxy Note 5 features a 5.7" Super AMOLED screen, which is designed to produce bright images with robust color reproduction while giving you easy access to device notifications. The screen's detailed QHD 2560 x 1440 resolution enables vivid and detailed high-definition content. For photo capturing and video chatting, this smartphone features an f/1.9 5-megapixel front camera and an f/1.9 16-megapixel rear camera. Optical image stabilization is onboard for shooting stability, and there's even an LED flash for taking pictures in low-light situations. Auto HDR allows you to enjoy photos with optimized exposure. On the video side, the rear camera allows you to capture detailed video at 4K resolution. The Samsung Galaxy Note 5 has Bluetooth 4.2 built-in for pairing with other Bluetooth-enabled devices, and dual-band 802.11ac Wi-Fi for high-speed Internet connectivity. Integrated Wi-Fi Direct and NFC give you the ability to connect-to compatible devices for wirelessly sharing content like photos and music. The Samsung Note 5 is equipped with a non-removable 3000mAh battery which features fast charging technology and can offer up to 64 hours of music playback
feature_bullets: Display: 5.7 inches (~75.9% screen-to-body ratio) - 1440 x 2560 pixels (~518 ppi pixel density
